name: GhostScript Lite
short_description: GhostScript Lite is a MSI installer of Ghostscript Lite - the lite version of open source interpreter for PostScript/PDF. The project is built using Advanced Installer Free Edition which can be found at http://www.advancedinstaller.com/download.html
